EmailTemplate.description: When Companies House rejects one transaction
EmailTemplate.name: CH Rejected Transaction
EmailTemplate.subject: Application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies House
Application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
Dear {!Transaction__c.PresenterName__c},
The application to close the following company has been rejected:
Company Name: {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c} Company Number: {!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c} Registered address: <Registered address>
The application was rejected for the following reasons: {!Transaction__c.ErrorDescription__c}
Please contact Companies House quoting the reference number '{!Transaction__c.SubmissionId__c}' for further details.
Email: enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk Service Desk: +44 (0)303 1234 500
This is an automated email, please do not reply. Forward any enquiries to the following: Email: enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk Service Desk: +44 (0)303 1234 500
